Select what type of file you are installing from the Home screen.

Installing Layers:
 ******************
 1/ click on Button 1 on the home screen "Layers Installer".
 2/ click Button 1 on Install Layers screen "Choose Your Layers.zip that you predownloaded".
 3/ navigate to your predownloaded layers.zip or individual .apk file that you want to install and click it.
 4/ click Button 2 "Install Chosen Layer".
 (you can then check whats installed by clicking Button 4 "Installed Layers").
 5/ delete what you don't want before clicking Button 3 "Reboot Your Device"\, for the layers to take effect.
 
 Deleting 1 layer at a time:
 ***************************
 1/ click Button 4 "installed Layers".
 2/ Pick a layer.apk to delete.
 3/ check the checkbox then click bottom left button "Delete Your Chosen Layer".
 (you can then click button 4 again to check it was deleted).
 
 Deleting everything in the Installed folder:
 ********************************************
 1/ check the checkbox.
 2/ click the bottom right button "Delete all Installed Layers".
 (click button 4 again to check they have all gone).
 
 TIPS:
 *****
 1/ you can package any number of layers.apk's into a folder of your choice then zip the whole folder and install it in one go or just pick the .apk's 1x1.
 2/ use the "Installed Layers" Button to check whats currently installed.
 3/ you also need to reboot after deleting to remove them from your system.
